resources.string: Drag map to change current position
Use two fingers to zoom in and zoom out map
Use track button to start tracking current position
Filter button allows to filter points of interest by categories (shops, museums, hostels, etc.)
Application shows what sights available in nearest roads. You can click on direction label to view details about sights in direction
RoadSigns can download navigation data and offline maps from online repository. Online content screen shows what content is available and notifies about content updates
Refresh button can be used to check updates of content
Stop button interrupts any current download task. Existing content will not be touched.
In sights screen you can browse all available points of interest and filter them by name and category. Use tabs to show points of interest from one category.
You can place any compatible third-party maps to "roadsigns" folder on your SD-Card
